title: Jungler Camping skins
body: It would be awesome to see some camping themed jungler skins. Backing animation would be something around building a tent and a fire. I don't know if it's just me or not but that would be some amazing skins.

replies.body:
Wait.. how has no one thought about this?!

Camping Nocturne
Camping Gragas
Camping Volibear
Camping Kha Zix

I'd buy them all.
Pretty sure camping Kha'Zix would be a giant mosquito, just there to annoy the campers.
Only if their dance animation can be them sitting at a campfire singing and playing guitar
My only concern is a camper Ivern, which would be a bit creepy.
I am very much in favor
